newsitem.title: USA: Bruegger's to enter Canadian bagel market.
newsitem.headline: Bruegger's to enter Canadian bagel market.

text.p: Quality Dining Inc. said Wednesday its Bruegger's bagel unit signed an agreement to build at least 150 stores in Canada.
Bruegger's Canada Inc., which is based in Montreal, was granted exclusive right to develop Bruegger's Bagel Bakeries and to sell franchises to third parties in Canada, the company said.
Quality Dining said the first five Canadian units are expected to open by the spring of 1997 in Toronto.

Bruegger's said it currently operates and franchises 505 quick service and casual theme dining restaurants, including, 87 Bruegger's Bagel Bakeries and 286 franchised units; 63 Burger King restaurants; 42 Grady's American Grill restaurants; 21 Chili's Grill & Bar restaurants; and six Spageddies Italian Kitchen restaurants.
